sections.title: About Us
sections.content: We are a leading technology company focused on innovation and excellence. Join us in building the future.

sections.title: Benefits & Perks
sections.content:
• Competitive salary
• Health insurance
• 401k matching
• Remote work options
• Professional development

sections.title: Our Culture
sections.content: We believe in work-life balance, diversity, and continuous learning.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description: We are looking for an experienced software engineer to join our growing team. You will work on cutting-edge projects and collaborate with talented developers.
requirements: Strong knowledge of React and Node.js

jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.description: Join our design team and help create beautiful, user-friendly products. Work closely with product managers and engineers.

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description: Lead our marketing efforts and help grow our brand. Manage campaigns, content, and team.

sections.title: Our Story
sections.content: Founded in 2020, we're a fast-growing startup building the next generation of products.

sections.title: Our Values
sections.content: Innovation, Speed, Customer Focus, and Teamwork.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Build amazing user interfaces using React and TypeScript. Work on exciting projects in a fast-paced environment.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Build scalable APIs and services. Work with modern technologies and best practices.
